sentences.en: Godalhi and Koon pooled their resources in the capture of nefarious criminals.
sentences.cn: 在克隆人战争爆发前,孔曾被派往泰斯追捕海盗.

sentences.en: He was universally feared because of his many nefarious deeds.
sentences.cn: 因为他干了许多罪恶的勾当,所以人人都惧怕他.

sentences.en: nefarious activities such as drug trafficking and fraud
sentences.cn: 贩毒和诈骗之类的犯罪活动

sentences.en: The gifts of the earth were put only to nefarious uses.
sentences.cn: 大地的赐予全被用去造孽.

sentences.en: Why make a whole village prisoner if it was not to some nefarious purpose?
sentences.cn: 如果不是出于某种恶毒的目的，为什么把整村人囚禁起来？

words.tran_cn: 邪恶的；穷凶极恶的；不法的
